Package net.minecraftforge.items.wrapper

Class EntityArmorInvWrapper

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.items.wrapper.EntityEquipmentInvWrapper
net.minecraftforge.items.wrapper.EntityArmorInvWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IItemHandler, IItemHandlerModifiable
public class EntityArmorInvWrapper
extends EntityEquipmentInvWrapper
Exposes the armor inventory of an EntityLivingBase as an IItemHandler using EntityLivingBase#getItemStackFromSlot and EntityLivingBase#setItemStackToSlot.
